original_text: And it came to pass after this, that there was again a battle with the Philistines at Gob: then Sibbechai the Hushathite slew Saph, which was of the sons of the giant.
korean_text: 그 후에 다시 블레셋 사람과 곱에서 전쟁할 때에 후사 사람 십브개는 거인족의 아들 중의 삽을 쳐죽였고

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after this
that there was again a battle
which was of the sons of the giant
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거인의 자손 중 한 사람이었습니다
